Title: 'PoC||GTFO' issue no. 08 PDF document is a 'plain English'-to-'plain English' en- & de-crypting polyglot device too...
Description:
This ASCiinema screencast shows some aspects of the PDF file which is issue 08 of the International Reverse Engineering and Hacker Magazine (*my* label, not theirs!) -- aspects which all can be explored from the command line.

Get surprised! -- Or DID you know you can make a valid (in the sense: every major viewer opens it without any warning or error message) PDF document to double up as an executable program -- one that encrypts all the English plain text snippets you feed it into other English plain text snippets (and back again).
